spiritsExplanation:
The workout video is classified primarily as 'High-Energy & Intense' with a high score of 0.9. This is strongly supported by the repeated emphasis on 'HIIT', 'speed intervals', and 'burning elliptical HIIT workout' in the tags and description, indicating a session with fast-paced, high-intensity intervals. The description also mentions toning and strengthening the entire leg muscle group through various interval exercises, which aligns with the 'High-Energy & Intense' spirit.

The 'Flow & Rhythm' spirit receives a moderate score of 0.6. The mention of a soundtrack with hip hop, rock, and pop music suggests a music-driven pace, which is corroborated by viewers appreciating the playlist in the comments.

The 'Structured & Disciplined' spirit is scored at 0.65 due to the structured format of backward/forward intervals and a constant incline setting at 2%, indicating a methodical approach to targeting specific muscle groups effectively.

Other spirits were excluded as they did not match the intensity-focused indoor setting or the workout's goals of toning and strengthening as much as others.
